Title: Harmonious Approach
Description:
I know I cannot stop Orweyna from going down there and drawing attention to our presence.

But... perhaps we could stop word of our presence from spreading.

Find whoever is in charge of this harvest site. And... do what is needed to ensure they can't spread the word.
PortraitGiverText: An important figure in charge of the Black Blood harvesting operation. Anything he sees down here will certainly be reported upward.
CompletionText: I'm not going to leave her down here alone. But we have to be cautious. We must deal with anyone who sees us.
RewardText: I will admit, I am glad to have had you with us through all of this.
